text: Maciej Zakościelny (born 7 May 1980, Stalowa Wola) is a Polish film, television and theatre actor. ==Life and career== He was born on 7 May 1980 in Stalowa Wola. In 2004, he began his studies at the National Academy of Dramatic Art in Warsaw but didn't complete them. He began his acting career by appearing on TV series such as Plebania, Sfora, Na Jelenia, Samo życie and Na dobre i na złe. He played his first major film role in Jerzy Hoffman's 2003 film An Ancient Tale: When the Sun Was a God. In 2004, he started performing at the Współczesny Theatre in Warsaw and joined the cast of popular TV crime drama Kryminalni playing the character of Marek Brodecki. He appeared in Ryszard Zatorski's 2005 romantic comedy Tylko mnie kochaj (Just Love Me). Between 2008–2014, he starred in historical television series Czas honoru playing the role of Bronek Woyciechowski, one of the Silent Unseens. Between 2017–2019, he played a role in the Diagnoza (Diagnosis) TV show, which earned him a nomination to the Telekamera Award for Best Actor. ==Personal life== He received musical education and plays the violin. In 2009, he performed at the Jazz Jamboree Festival alongside singer Marianna Wróblewska and jazz pianst Beata Przybytek. Since 2014, he has been in a relationaship with model Paulina Wyka with whom he has got two sons. ==Appearances in film and television== *2001–2002: Plebania as Marek Bednarek *2002–2004: Na dobre i na złe as Igor Kurowski *2002: Na jelenie as Emil *2002: Samo życie as Antoni Knapik *2002: Sfora as wspólnik Lipskiego *2002: Sfora: Bez litości as wspólnik Lipskiego *2003: An Ancient Tale: When the Sun Was a God as Wramot *2004–2008: Kryminalni as podkomisarz Marek Brodecki *2005: Solidarność, Solidarność... as Janek *2006: Tylko mnie kochaj as Michał *2007: Dlaczego nie! as Jan *2007: Nightwatching as Egremont *2008: Serce na dłoni as secretary *2008–2014: Czas honoru as Bronek Woyciechowski *2012: Reguły gry as Adam Morawski *2012: Prawo Agaty as Konrad Nałęcz (episode 24) *2015: Strażacy as Adam Wojnar *2015: Listy do M. 2 as Robert "Redo" Bartosiewicz *2016: 7 rzeczy, których nie wiecie o facetach as Kordian *2017: Po prostu przyjaźń as Grzegorz *2017: Music, War and Love as Lukas *2017–2019: Diagnoza as doctor Michał Wolski *2018: Dywizjon 303. Historia prawdziwa as Jan Zumbach *2019: Miszmasz, czyli kogel-mogel 3 as Piotr Wolański ==See also== *Polish cinema *Polish Film Awards ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male actors Category:Polish male television actors Category:People from Stalowa Wola
title: Maciej Zakościelny
